title: The Future of Kinda Funny - A Conversation with Colin
description:
Get everything early here: http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

This video was edited on an ORIGIN PC EVO15-S Laptop. Get you PC here www.ORIGINPC.com.

Thanks to our location, Tempest Bar in SF: https://www.facebook.com/TempestBar

Buy our shirts! http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

The final season of A Conversation With Colin begins!

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation

Music By Tonedeff: http://www.twitter.com/Tonedeff

transcript_chunks.text: and you were like we I want to do a show I have a brilliant idea I want to do a show about you where I just you just say [ __ ] Yeah where I talk to you and I was like okay what's up everybody Welcome to a conversation with Colin I'm Greg and this is my roommate Colin now sometimes Colin says crazy stuff so for the final time in the final season I'm reaching into my random topic pile pulling one out throwing one at him and talking it out for your amusement if you like that subscribe to us here on YouTube like the video share us with your friends and of course support us at patreon.com kind ofun which is the whole reason we're doing this final season Colin are you ready yes today's topic is what excites you to make so much stuff for kind of funny what's the eventual goal this is from Frankie McFarland over on our patreon page um that's a that's a tough question because I think a big question it is and we have to unpack it okay oh finally we're unpacking something on this show uh uh I
